name: BOVERTY
description:
**PLAY IN FULLSCREEN**

BOVERTY

Boverty is an idle clicker game where you fund an organization and purchase upgrades.

Every second, the population is constantly fluctuating, however, it is clear that the overall population is declining! Donate and purchase items like clothing and livestock to help unleash the untapped potential in an impoverished community!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Honestly, there's no time to read out all the upgrades so here's a typed-up version if you are curious.

Advertisements: With advertisements for the organization, more people are willing to donate! Increases how much is donated per click.

Quick Rations: Supply the impoverished with the basic necessity of food! Increase population by 2500.

Clothes: Prevent the deaths of many through the gift of warmth!
Reduces population decline slightly.

Livestock: With the provision of livestock, numerous of famished children are able to become well-fed! Increases population expansion slightly.

Agriculture: With the addition of crops, the development of self-sustainability begins! Increases population expansion each upgrade.

Housing Infastructure: The more houses, the more people!
Slightly increases the speed of population expansion!

Healthcare: The adding of healthcare allows the recovery of many suffering of illnesses. Reduces the speed of population decline.

Education: Educating the community will allow them to grow at an unimaginable rate! Greatly increases the speed of population expansion

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

P.S. This was a game made for a multimodal project on a social issue :P

P.P.S. Probably took around 12 hours in total
